name: Barnes & Noble Education, Inc.
description: Barnes & Noble Education, Inc. is a leading provider of educational products and services in the United States, primarily focusing on serving the needs of students and educators at colleges and universities. Founded in 2015 as a spin-off from Barnes & Noble, Inc., the company specializes in managing bookstores on college campuses and providing a comprehensive array of digital learning solutions. BNED operates over 1,400 campus bookstores and serves more than 5 million students annually. The company offers a wide selection of textbooks, course materials, and school supplies, along with a growing portfolio of digital offerings designed to enhance the learning experience. BNED is committed to supporting students through affordable solutions, including its rental and used textbook programs, which help to reduce the cost of education. Additionally, Barnes & Noble Education embraces technology to facilitate a modern educational environment, providing tools and resources that foster academic success. The company's mission is to empower students to succeed by creating an engaging and supportive educational ecosystem, making it a trusted partner in education.

seo.meta_title: Barnes & Noble Education, Inc. | Educational Solutions and Campus Bookstores
seo.meta_description: Explore Barnes & Noble Education, Inc., a leader in providing educational products and services to college and university students. Learn about our mission, products, and commitment to academic success.

faq.question: What does Barnes & Noble Education do?
faq.answer: Barnes & Noble Education provides educational products and services, including textbooks and digital learning solutions, primarily for college students.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Barnes & Noble Education?
faq.answer: Michael P. Huseby is the CEO of Barnes & Noble Education, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Barnes & Noble Education headquartered?
faq.answer: Barnes & Noble Education is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Barnes & Noble Education offer?
faq.answer: The company offers new and used textbooks, textbook rentals, and a variety of digital learning tools.

faq.question: When was Barnes & Noble Education founded?
faq.answer: Barnes & Noble Education was founded in 2015.
